subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Giants punter Jeff Feagles, who formally announced his retirement after a record-setting 22-year N.F.L. career,   leaves a legacy as a maestro of directional punting.
snippet: Giants punter Jeff Feagles, who formally announced his retirement after a record-setting 22-year N.F.L. career,   leaves a legacy as a maestro of directional punting.
